ability.description: Can manipulate the fabric of space-time to create or alter matter.
Can move objects with their mind, even across vast distances.
Can render themselves invisible to the naked eye.

event.title: The Great Nebula Creation
event.impact: Zyphron single-handedly created a new star system, providing a new home for countless species.

event.title: The Battle of the Void
event.impact: Zyphron led a coalition of alien species to victory against a hostile force, ensuring peace across the galaxy.
